news_header: Donald Trump has proposed relocating Palestinians from Gaza, with Saudi Arabia planning to host a summit with leaders from Egypt, Jordan, Qatar, and the UAE to discuss this proposal.
news_original_title: Hallintolähde: Saudi-Arabia isännöi huippukokouksen Trumpin Gaza-suunnitelmasta
news_text: The summit is set to occur before the Arab League meeting in Cairo on February 27. Palestinian Authority President Mahmud Abbas is also expected to attend. Trump's plan suggests that Palestinians moved to Egypt and Jordan may not return to Gaza, which has been met with strong opposition from Arab nations, as forced displacement is considered a war crime.
